title: Matrix Transposition
description:
Given an 'n x m' matrix, produce a 'm x n' matrix where the rows and columns are swapped (transposed matrix).

For example:

[1, 2]
[3, 4]
becomes
[1, 3]
[2, 4].

The input will be given as a string, '[[1, 2], [3, 4], [5, 6]]', and the output should be a string of the same format
